content.text: Kozlov brings a hand up to his grizzled chin. "Dangerous, but a good observation. Things just sort of... appear, on the shore. Bound to be some good ones. Just don't look at the water."
"If you do, it's your funeral," Kasha grunts, and keeps her eyes downcast as she approaches the shoreline, water lapping at her heels as it ebbs and flows.
You and Kozlov are close behind, both keeping your heads down.

content.label: You'll be careful.
content.pre-label: Not yet implemented. Do not click.
